channel.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
channel.description:
http://www.kristv.com/news/pistol-packing-pastor/
two of mopar's favourite things and two of the communities favourite things to argue about.
cue religious gun debate.

item.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This guy had to intention to shoot or kill these kids, but he would have done it if his life was threatened, and regardless of their age, he would have had every right to do so.

Read full topic
item.source: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol

item.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:21, topic:381920”][quote author=Frell link=topic=477730.msg3498203#msg3498203 date=1297513819]
He had them on the floor on their knees with their hands up
[/quote]

Sounds like his life was in danger and he had to shoot them to me[/quote]
But one of the teenagers threatened to take out his gun, how would he stop him without the teen shooting while trying to get it from him?

Read full topic
item.source: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol

item.source: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol

item.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:16, topic:381920”][quote author=Frell link=topic=477730.msg3497776#msg3497776 date=1297474915]

Thou shalt not kill.

He wasnt going to execute him in the middle of the church, hed just pop him in the arm or something.
[/quote]

Yea, like it’s really easy to hit someone in the arm with a pistol.

Are you fucking kidding me Frell? Have you ever shot a pistol?[/quote]
He had them on the floor on their knees with their hands up, they were probably 2 feet from him… Are you fucking kidding me RSC? Have you ever read the article?

R.I.P RSC:

Besides that, why the fuck would you even think about shooting a teenager? They’re kids, they don’t know what the hell they are actually doing. Obviously something went wrong in their upbringing, so you do something about that. You don’t shoot them and send them down a spiral that ends up with them being murderers and gang members. It’s better to prevent than to cure. And from what I know of the penitentiary system in the US, once you’re in jail you’ll be a bigger criminal when you come out again.

Doesn’t matter. Why should the pastor let the teenager possibly kill him if all they’ll be doing the rest of their life is sitting in jail?

Read full topic
item.source: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol

item.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

No, they’re clearly hardened criminals by this time and only a bullet in the head will save them!

Read full topic
item.source: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol

item.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Even with training it’s still hard to hit someone in the arm without the risk to inflict a deadly wound. Especially with a pistol. A pastor isn’t trained to deal with these situations, so he’s nervous. A pistol shot in the shoulder from a distance can easily turn into a bullet in the lungs, or even worse, in the heart.

Besides that, why the fuck would you even think about shooting a teenager? They’re kids, they don’t know what the hell they are actually doing. Obviously something went wrong in their upbringing, so you do something about that. You don’t shoot them and send them down a spiral that ends up with them being murderers and gang members. It’s better to prevent than to cure. And from what I know of the penitentiary system in the US, once you’re in jail you’ll be a bigger criminal when you come out again.

Read full topic
item.source: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol

item.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, I didn’t want to respond to the trolls in this thread, but now I think some of them may actually be serious…

First of all, this guy was a pastor, not a priest.

Bowser jr:

He must lack a lot of faith, since he is carrying a gun…

So everyone who supports themselves lacks faith too? Surely if you believe in God that means you don’t have to do anything for yourself, feed yourself, protect yourself, use doctors, God will take care of it all?

I guess there are a handful of religions that do think this way, but the vast majority by far don’t. God gave us intelligence and the means to help ourselves and it would be an insult not to avail ourselves of those gifts.

R.I.P RSC:

[quote]Thou shalt not kill.[/quote]

Yes, you aren’t supposed to murder people. Self defense is perfectly legitimate.

[quote=“Unhandled, post:15, topic:381920”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=477730.msg3498032#msg3498032 date=1297490760]
Yeah why does everyone assume that if someone has a gun, that they have the intent to kill?
[/quote]

just a guess, but perhaps it’s because a majority of gun owners have little training in a situation where they would actually have to make a quick decision about shooting someone?[/quote]

Actually, in most states (like mine), you have to have training to be eligible for a concealed carry permit. Also, basically every law abiding citizen that carries a gun knows how to use it.

Read full topic
item.source: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol

[/quote]
He wasnt going to execute him in the middle of the church, hed just pop him in the arm or something.[/quote]

Yea, like it’s really easy to hit someone in the arm with a pistol.

Are you fucking kidding me Frell? Have you ever shot a pistol?

Read full topic

item.title: Concealed carrying pastor stops church thieves with his pistol
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:3, topic:381922"][quote author=yakman link=topic=477730.msg3496496#msg3496496 date=1297364435]
Those idiot teenagers should’ve brought their own guns.
[/quote]

One of them claimed that they did, the pastor told them that if they tried to take out a weapon he would have to shoot them.[/quote]

Okay then bringing a gun isn’t good enough. That boy should’ve held it in his hand the whole time like one of those spies from a film. Pointing it at every corner of a room before he entered just in case.

Read full topic
